error.api: The JIRA API returned an error when creating. Make sure your registration is correct, say "whoami" in a private conversation with me to find your username and set it by saying "register" in a private conversation with me

assign.success: I successfully assigned you to issue {{issueKey}}. Please doublecheck JIRA just to be sure. Robots make mistakes you know.

register.question: To register your JIRA account you will have tell me your name in JIRA. Please make sure your name is between double quotes (for example: "Slackbot") so I can find your name in the message. If you don't know your username have a look here: {{- jiraProfileUrl}}.
register.stop: The registration process has been stopped.
register.success: Your registration was successfull with username {{username}}. If you want to change your registration just say 'registration' again. From now on you will be able to assign yourself to JIRA issues by saying something like: '@reachbot assign REF-XXX'

error.no_email: It seems like you send me an email address, please try again and use the username from your profile instead.
error.no_result: I can't seem to find your username, please make sure you send me your username between double quotes ("").

link.success: The link between {{issue1}} & {{issue2}} was successfully created. Please double check JIRA to make sure that it was done correctly.

error.api: I tried to link two issues but I failed. :( There was an error when requesting the API, please try again later
error.message: I tried to link two issues but I failed. :( I couldn't find the link type in your message. Please follow the following pattern: *link REF-<number> is blocked by RE-<number>*. Link type can be one of the following: is blocked by, relates to, is duplicated by or is caused by.

error.not_found: I thought I heard you talking about an issues just a second ago, but I was unable to find it on JIRA. I'm sorry. :disappointed:

registration.title: Your user data
registration.text: This is the data that I have from <@{{userId}}>

error.user_get: There was a problem when getting you from the database. Please make sure that you registered yourself username with me.
error.user_none: I was unable to find you in my brain. Please say "register" in a private conversation and let me know you JIRA username.
error.save: Something went wrong while saving, I'm sorry. :disappointed: Please try again, if it still doesn't work contact my creator Johan van Eck.

meta.love: Aahh... I love you too! :heart: But just know that I will never love you like I love my creator: Johan van Eck.
